title: James Ferrell
description: James Ferrell is a front-end designer in Boston, MA. This is his portfolio site. He doesn't usually talk in the third person like this.
keywords: design, web design, ui design, visual design, development, developer, website, webdev, frontend, front-end, branding, identity, kirby cms, sketch, boston, tampa, freelance, contract, responsive, accessibility, accessible, a11y, 508, mobile, phone, tablet, react, vue, javascript, vanilla, css, scss, sass, postcss, es6, gulp, grunt, git
colophon: This site has been built from the ground up with [Vue](https://vuejs.org/) and [GraphQL](https://graphql.org/) via the [Gridsome](https://gridsome.org/) framework. I wrote a [blog post](./blog/gridsome) about it.
